title: Berkeley Meetup This Thursday
summary:
Key ideas
- The author (Scott) will be in Berkeley as part of his Meetups Everywhere tour.
- The author invites anyone to come, regardless of whether they are a typical reader of his blog.
- The meetup will take place at a private residence called "Event Horizon" on October 10th at 6:00 PM.
- The event is open to anyone who wants to attend and some participants may go to Jupiter afterwards.

Key learnings
- Meetups Everywhere tour is a way for the author to connect with his readers outside of his blog.
- The author values inclusivity and encourages people to attend his events regardless of differences.

Key questions
- What is the purpose of the Meetups Everywhere tour?
- How do events like these provide value to the author and his readers?
- How can the author improve future Meetups Everywhere events?
